title: Interpretation of seeing a marriage contract in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a marriage contract in a dream via the Vision website roy2a.com and seeing a marriage contract in a dream indicates good luck, fulfillment of desires, a prestigious job, and overcoming adversity and difficulties because it indicates good news, and if the marriage contract is with a person who is not incestuous but is known It indicates anxiety and sadness, and in this article we will explain the interpretation of seeing a marriage contract in a dream: a man, an unmarried young man, an unmarried woman, as well as married and divorced women for some imams such as Imam Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, and other modern-day translators, so follow us on the Vision website. Is the interpretation of a marriage contract in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing a marriage contract in a dream indicates a lot of good for the dreamer and achieving what he wants. Seeing a marriage contract in a dream indicates the death of a loved one and he may be the one who had the vision. A dream of concluding a marriage contract in a man’s dream indicates good luck. Happy and the completion of a successful business project. Seeing a marriage contract with a mahram in a dream indicates relief after distress, paying off debts, and removing tension. See also: Interpretation of seeing a tug of war in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a marriage contract in a single woman’s dream? Dreaming of a marriage contract for an unmarried woman indicates That she will achieve what she wants, we wish you success and that she will hear good news. If an unmarried girl sees a wedding in a dream, this indicates good luck, the fulfillment of a wish, and a wonderful future. Seeing a sign of a marriage contract in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the fulfillment of her dreams and goals and the attainment of A wonderful future. See also: Interpretation of seeing an invitation to joy or marriage distributed in a dream. What is the interpretation of a marriage contract in a married woman’s dream? A dream about a marriage contract for a married woman indicates very good, wishful thinking, and good luck. If a married woman sees that she was married to someone A stranger in her dream, this indicates scandal and trouble for her. If a married woman sees a marriage contract with a mahram, a father or a brother, in a dream, this indicates many good things that she will obtain, and she will enjoy the blessings and abundance of food. See also: Interpretation of seeing joy Zucchini in a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing the Qur’an recited in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman dreams of being married to a stranger, this indicates ease of childbirth, ease of giving birth, and enjoyment of good health for the newborn. Dreaming of concluding a marriage contract with a mahram in a dream for pregnant women, this indicates great kindness and natural childbirth. See Also: Interpretation of seeing wedding equipment in a dream. What is the interpretation of a marriage contract in a divorced woman’s dream? If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is marrying a stranger or one of her mahrams, then this indicates good luck and fulfillment of what she longs for, and that she will achieve what she wants. If a divorced woman sees her marriage contract without... Muharram in a dream, it means hearing bad news and troubles and exposing her secrets and privacy in front of the public. What is the interpretation of a marriage contract document in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a marriage card for an unmarried girl in a dream means that her desires will come true, and that she will achieve

title: Interpretation of dreams about swimming in the sea for singles with someone you love

preview.html: We also agreed that dreams are a big world with their symbols, signs, and secrets, and there are dreams that portend, including good news and others, and the psychological and social factor of the viewer affects its meaning and his vision of the meaning. Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a single woman with someone she loves. Seeing a single girl swimming in the sea with someone she loves shows the strength of the relationship The emotional relationship between them. It also appears that they are thinking about taking an engagement step. Perhaps this indicates that the real lover is coming forward to the girl’s family to marry her, and that she is waiting for her father. As for the fiancée who sees herself swimming with her beloved “fiancé”, remember that a date has been set. A marriage contract Whoever dreams that you are swimming with your lover in the depths of the sea shows great love between them. As for whoever sees that she is drowning with her lover and he leaves her and runs away alone, this indicates that this person is manipulating her feelings. The vision here is a warning that she is reconsidering her decision to marry this person. Interpretation of a dream about bathing with sea water. Whoever sees himself bathing with sea water in a dream indicates his repentance from his sins and misdeeds that he committed before. The vision also indicates the end of worries. It may indicate that the fortuneteller has acquired a pearl from the sea and is seeking to sell it for money. The meaning of a dream about swimming quickly in the sea. The vision shows The dreamer is struggling and striving to meet his desires and goals in life. Whoever dreams that he is swimming in the sea in the cold winter and drowns, it is a sign of death, and God knows best. Concerning swimming in the winter season, in the dream it indicates illness. The meaning of seeing yourself swimming in the sea with difficulty. When you see swimming in a dream, and it is difficult and tiring, it shows the difficulties that The dreamer faces it in his life. Swimming in the sea that is empty indicates anxiety and tension in the dreamer’s heart regarding one of his friends. The scientist who sees that he is swimming in a large and clear sea indicates an increase in his knowledge that will benefit others. Interpretation of a vision of drowning in the sea When someone dreams of drowning in the sea and being covered with water, it is a sign of his death And his martyrdom, and God knows best. The vision of walking on water shows the goodness of the dreamer’s condition. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about killing a snake by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about killing a snake: A person is confused if he sees a snake in his sleep, especially if it follows it and follows it to afflict evil, but upon seeing this scene, jurists emphasize the evil that is chasing the sleeper while it is very close to him and it becomes clear. He has the first opportunity, and he can escape from it in one case, that is, by killing him. From the damage that surrounds it, and in our article we present the most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin regarding the vision of killing a snake in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about killing a snake Killing a snake in a dream is a sign of stability and the cessation of illness and sadness. So his fatigue and healing, and if there are many family disputes and problems, then killing the snake in the house is a sign of agreement and the return of peace with the death of stress and sadness from your home. If the sleeper sees that he is killing the snake in the dream or slaughtering it, then interpretation scholars say that beautiful things will come his way, such as Brilliant success in his professional or emotional life. Next.Interpretation of a dream about killing a snake by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin confirms a number of happy thoughts associated with killing a snake in a dream and confirms that getting rid of it is a symbol of a new beginning for a person. Sometimes a person sees a snake in a dream, but is not afraid to confront it, and in this case the interpretations are very difficult and express The presence of great evil and corruption in a person’s life, but he does not realize it, such as he is a person who is close to him and always gets him into crises and bad events, but he does not know that and believes that he is a good and honest person and does many good things for himself. The Asrar dream interpretation website is a website specialized in Interpretation of dreams in the Arab world. Just type the Asrar Dream Interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about killing an unmarried womanWhen an unmarried girl says that she killed a snake in a dream, it was trying to harm me and it bit me, interpretation scholars resort to the return of joy and goodness to her reality with friends The wicked and corrupt stay away from it, or they might. They are enemies and she tries to stay away from them as a result of the evil that she falls into because of them and her relationship with them collapses and they cannot cause sadness and failure. Seeing a large snake in a girl’s dream is confirmation of an intense battle with illness or psychological problems and that she has become greatly desperate and exhausted. This could happen due to a failure in a romantic relationship or the discovery of the truth about a friend of hers, or an illness, God forbid. Interpretation of a dream about killing a married woman: When a woman kills a snake in a dream without it harming her, jurists explain that there is another woman who was conspiring against her and trying to spoil most of her affairs, including In that marital life, through her deceitful words and the evil thoughts that she was directing. And one of the connotations of killing a snake or snake in a woman’s dream is that it is evidence of her escaping from evil and fear. Interpretation of a dream about killing a snake for a pregnant woman: Getting rid of a snake in a dream for a pregnant woman is a symbol of salvation from evil, fears, and bad things. If she is facing a serious illness and fears its impact on her pregnancy, the dream indicates that she will overcome it soon

title: Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream It is a vision that indicates achievements and excellence in various areas of life. The person who sees the teacher or talks to him in a dream, this vision shows the arrival of goodness and livelihood and whoever sees it may get a new prestigious job. The teacher in a dream must know that his life will change for the better by God’s command and perhaps vice versa. This vision varies depending on the situation in which the dreamer finds himself. Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream: Whoever dreams of a teacher screaming at him, this is a sign of weakness and inability to deal with problems. If a man sees a woman in a dream This is a sign that he will soon marry a beautiful girl and obtain a prestigious position. Seeing the pregnant wife of our teacher in a dream means that she will soon be happy and enjoy a happy married life. Seeing an unmarried young man as a teacher in a dream means success, privilege, and victory in one’s life in general, and God is Most High. And I know.Interpretation of dreams to see a teacher he loves in a dream. A person who sees a mentor he loves in a dream indicates that the dreamer must think carefully before making a decision. Observation pointLove the teacherIn a dream, righteousness, piety, and getting closer to God Almighty through understanding and prayer.Seeing the love of a teacher whom I do not know in a dream It symbolizes the seriousness and arrogance of the worldly view of Almighty God. If one sees that he loves his teacher in a dream, then this dream indicates a great achievement that he will achieve soon. Interpretation of seeing the teacher kissing in a dream Seeing the sleeper kissing his teacher in a dream indicates the good qualities of the dreamer and God knows best. The sleeper wakes up in front of A teacher is a sign that he will obtain a prestigious position and a higher position in the near future. Kissing a teacher in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will achieve all his goals and ambitions as quickly as possible. If one kisses his teacher in a dream, this shows the appreciation and respect that the dreamer has around him. Interpretation Dreaming of the death of a teacher in a dream symbolizes the hour. The death of a teacher in a dream, this means that in reality he will die or one of the fortuneteller’s relatives will die. Seeing the death of a teacher in a dream is a sign that the dreamer has a very hard heart and needs to get closer to God to soften his heart. Seeing the death of a teacher in a dream It means that the dreamer turns away from God during this time, does not fulfill his prayers and ignores his religion. Dreaming about the death of a teacher in a dream symbolizes the bad deeds and actions that the dreamer does at this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams that I am a teacher in a school. Seeing an unmarried girl working as a teacher inside the school It indicates that she will reach a high position in the near future. Look at the man who is a school teacher, and he mentions that he will face many problems with his family, and God knows best. To dream of being a teacher in a school symbolizes success, distinction, victory, and pride in personal and professional life, God willing. If a girl sees only that she is a teacher, which It means that she will achieve her ambitions and raise her status in the world. Interpretation of a dream about a teacher hitting a student in a dream: If the sleeper sees his teacher hitting him, then this dream indicates that the dreamer is learning from the experiences of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about reciting Ayat al-Kursi to expel the jinn in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi to bring out the jinn with interesting and loving interpretations. For many people, it is considered a good vision in a dream. Ayat al-Kursi includes prominent features in the Qur’an and includes a wide range of interpretations when seen in a dream. You may be interested in meeting a black woman in a dream. As many of us see that he is reading Ayat al-Kursi and do not know the correct interpretation of these visions, in this article we will present to you the interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi To expel jeans for both men, married and free.Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s reading of Ayat al-Kursi on expelling jinnAn indication that the dreamer will soon move to a new home in which he feels comfortable and happy.Interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream for a married womanA sign of a lot of good money and abundance that she will have soon. Interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of ease of transmission. Interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi to expel jinn. Interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi to expel jinn. If an unmarried woman has a vision in her dreams that she is reading Ayat al-Kursi while she is afflicted with some kind of magic, then this vision indicates her recovery from it and from there. . It is a good thing that will come to her. And whoever sees in a dream that he recites Ayat al-Kursi in water and then drinks water over it, Ayat al-Kursi, then this indicates his recovery from the elders upon him and symbolizes great goodness. Some evidence for the interpretation of Ayat al-Kursi to expel the jinn. We explain several indications for the interpretation of Ayat al-Kursi in expelling the jinn. Evil spirits from the jinn: Whoever sees in his dream that he is reading Ayat Al-Kursi out loud to Ali, this vision indicates that he is going through serious difficulties in his life and must get closer to God and worship Him. A married woman, if she dreams that she is reading Al-Kursi, this means that she has gotten rid of an enemy who was He is trying to destroy her house, as Al-Nabulsi said. Whoever saw in his dream that he recited Ayat al-Kursi to expel the jinn, this indicates his recovery from distress and misguidance, and he became something closer to God than he was. Seeing Ayat al-Kursi in a dream also shows the burning of the jinn and avoiding problems and judgments for the dreamer. Interpretation of reading Ayat Al-Kursi for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is reading Ayat Al-Kursi and is affected by magic or touch, then the dream symbolizes that she will get rid of all this and escape from the problems she faces because of this magic. Or touch, and stay away from the path of evil and approach the path of good.Reciting Ayat Al-Kursi to expel the jinn for a manInterpretation of reading Ayat Al-Kursi to expel the jinn for a man If a man recites Ayat Al-Kursi in his sleep to expel the jinn, this means that the visionary is facing difficult and serious issues in his life and you will. Finish all of them. It is difficult to recite Ayat al-Kursi in a dream. Reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream with difficulty shows the dreamer’s inability to hide his feelings towards those around him or hide the truth from them. This may also indicate the presence of some crises and difficulties in the dreamer’s life, from which it is difficult for him to escape in the future. The near future. The difficulty of reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream also indicates the presence of some undesirable events in the life of the dreamer. Interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi out loud. Interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi indicates

Or touch, and stay away from the path of evil and approach the path of good.Reciting Ayat Al-Kursi to expel the jinn for a manInterpretation of reading Ayat Al-Kursi to expel the jinn for a man If a man recites Ayat Al-Kursi in his sleep to expel the jinn, this means that the visionary is facing difficult and serious issues in his life and you will. Finish all of them. It is difficult to recite Ayat al-Kursi in a dream. Reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream with difficulty shows the dreamer’s inability to hide his feelings towards those around him or hide the truth from them. This may also indicate the presence of some crises and difficulties in the dreamer’s life, from which it is difficult for him to escape in the future. The near future. The difficulty of reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream also indicates the presence of some undesirable events in the life of the dreamer. Interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi out loud. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a green snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a green snake in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, is that seeing snakes in reality is one of the things that causes anxiety and turmoil in the human heart, as they are among the frightening animals that can inflict harm, pain, and hurt on people. Pain as well as diseases to explain the elements of the snake in a dream and during these lines we will learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing a green snake in a dream.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a green snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin, as the scholar Ibn Sirin provided many explanations and interpretations for this dream, they differ from one person to another, and during We will learn about these lines. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a green snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Also: The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing a green snake in a dream. This dream is a symbol that some of the dreamer’s friends envy him and are jealous of him for the blessings that he has. Whereas if one sees the green snake in Bed in a dream. This dream indicates that he will be betrayed in the near future and that it will be his partner in life. Also, if one sees in a dream the green snake in front of the house. It is a sign that someone is watching him and trying to find out his secrets to use against him. See also: Interpretation of the dream Seeing my husband’s car in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a green snake for a married woman. Seeing a snake in a dream has many meanings and connotations as it differs from other characters, which have been interpreted by many dream interpretation scholars. During this paragraph we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about a green snake for a married woman. It is also: If a married woman sees a green snake. In a dream, it chases the dreamer. This is a sign of the goodness that the woman will soon receive. While seeing the white color in a dream is evidence that the health problem she is suffering from will be cured, and this is if she is sick. In addition to seeing the yellow snake in a dream. It is evidence of Loss, failure and lack of success in academic life. It could also be an expression of experiencing problems with her family, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In addition, seeing a green snake in a dream indicates the large sum that the dreamer will receive. See also: Interpretation of a dream to see a name Yahya in a dream and its meaning: Seeing a green snake in a dream for a divorced woman, as this vision for a divorced woman has many different meanings and connotations, which have been explained by many scholars and experts in dream interpretation, and in these lines we will learn about the interpretation of dreams. Seeing a green snake in a dream for a divorced woman is also: in the event that she sees A divorced woman sees a lot of snakes in a dream. This will be a symbol of many obstacles and adversities. In addition to seeing a green snake in a dream for a divorced woman. This is a sign that she will be promoted at work, that she will participate in good deeds, and it is a sign that God will give her a good and righteous husband. Also, if a divorced woman sees the death of a green snake in a dream, this is a sign that she will get rid of enemies. See also: The complete interpretation of the dream of seeing a guard according to the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of dreams about a green snake chasing me by Ibn Sirin. Also...

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking barefoot in the rain

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about walking barefootWho dreamed of it? Walking barefoot in a dream and cried loudly, indicating that he repented to God Almighty for the sins he had committed. The vision also suggests relief from the worry and anxiety that surrounded the viewer. The meaning of walking barefoot in the streetWhen a person dreams that he is walking barefoot On the street, the vision indicates that he is suffering from difficulties that he cannot solve. It may indicate difficulties at work and difficulty in earning a daily living. The meaning of walking barefoot in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin confirmed that this vision is not worthy of praise. He said that it shows financial and psychological crises For the pioneer. It indicates intense sadness, neglect, and sadness. As for someone who dreams of another person walking barefoot in a dream, this indicates that that person is suffering from difficulties and a debt crisis. What is the meaning of walking in a shoe with the sole of one foot? This vision indicates bad news. It indicates the death of the wife or husband. Whoever sees that he is walking barefoot on a long road means that he is facing great difficulties that are slow to be solved. The meaning of traveling on a long road barefoot. This vision indicates success in studying and achieving goals. It indicates achieving ambitions and paying off debts. Interpretation of walking Barefoot in the rainRain is a symbol of goodness, sustenance, and blessing from God Almighty. Whoever dreams that he is walking barefoot on a paved road in the rain, this indicates his ample livelihood after fatigue and misery. It also indicates the marriage of single people. Walking barefoot in the rain indicates recovery. Add the dream that You would like to explain it with reference to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a lion attacking me according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a lion attacking me: Many of us find in a dream a lion chasing us, and you may see that you are injured by a lion trying to attack you, and this matter causes you great sadness, and sometimes this dream is repeated more than once with the fortuneteller, and from here it is necessary to pay close attention so that the person repel evil from himself and search for it. About the source of the corruption that surrounds it, and that is why we are interested, during our article, in clarifying the meaning of the dream of a lion attack. I. Interpretation of a dream about a lion attacking me. Interpretation of a dream about a lion chasing me is a warning sign for the dreamer of some deception and malice that has been plotted against him by a bad-tempered person who seeks to spread sadness and corruption in his life. One of the indications that a lion attacks the sleeper is that it is a hateful harbinger of the occurrence of bad things such as losing someone. Loved ones or start a business but it will not be completed. The meaning can also indicate difficult news that causes serious psychological distress to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a lion attacking me by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a lion chasing me according to Ibn Sirin shows bad and malicious things being organized against the dreamer, and it is possible that he will fall under the influence of grave injustice or be accused of something bad that he did not It does in reality. Among the signs that Ibn Sirin pointed out in the lion’s attack on the dreamer is that this is evidence of the need to take into account some things that keep him safe and away from harm and dangers. Seeing a lion in a dream Fahd Al-OsaimiFahd Al-Osaimi interprets seeing a lion in a dream for the dreamer as evidence of his ability to overcome... Obstacles that prevented him from achieving his goals, and the way will open for him after that. If one sees a lion in his dream, this is a sign of his strong personality, which makes him capable of doing well in all situations he is exposed to. If the dreamer sees a lion in his sleep, this means He will achieve many things that he dreamed of and this will make him very happy. For the dreamer, seeing a lion in a dream symbolizes discovering the tricks that are hatching behind his back and saving him from the great harm that he was about to cause. If a man sees a lion in his dream, this is a sign of positive changes that It will happen in his life in many aspects of his life and this will put him in good stead. The online dream interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Interpretation of Dreams Online in Google and get the correct interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about a lion attacking me for a single womanThe lion attacking the girl in the dream is interpreted about the possible evil that will happen soon in her days and there may be a series of disputes or arguments that she will start, either at home or in Her work, and they will have to face many confrontations in reality. Interpreters say that a lion chasing an unmarried woman in a dream is considered troublesome, but if she can face it with courage and strong strength, the turbulent matters in her life will change and turn into happiness in addition to the great success he has achieved. I got. He succeeds in many things he wanted. Interpretation of a dream about a lion attack for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream being attacked by a lion indicates the presence of a malicious young man chasing her and waiting for a thousand...

title: Cutting hair in a dream for a single, married or pregnant girl

preview.html: Brothers and sisters, welcome to the dream interpretation website, where we present to you the interpretation of a dream about cutting, as stated in the great book Interpretation of Dreams attributed to Ibn Sirin. Among them, the dream interpretation of a haircut for a married and pregnant woman, or a beloved girl, b, as well as a man. What is the interpretation of hair in a dream? Hair in a dream is money, a blessing, and longevity. Whoever dreams that the hair on his head is long means his life will be prolonged and his livelihood and wealth will increase. As for cutting hair, it sometimes indicates the disappearance of worries, and in other places it indicates the loss of blessings or the loss of a loved one. Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried girl’s hair symbolizes her luck in beauty, and shaving in a dream indicates that the girl is not satisfied with her hair. Her appearance, or a little anxious due to a health problem, or she suffers from a disturbance in her general mood. If the hair cut in the dream looks dirty or not beautiful, then her stress and sadness will disappear. However, if a girl cuts her long or beautiful hair, then she loses a beloved person or something, and the most likely interpretation of a dream of cutting beautiful hair is the loss or loss of a lover, and it is said that the engagement has been cancelled. The meaning of cutting hair in a dream for a married woman. Hair in a married woman’s dream symbolizes fertility and procreation or Pregnancy, which is associated with femininity in general, and cutting it in a dream indicates reaching a stage in life in which there is no childbearing, and during which the menstrual cycle may occur. There is no pregnancy or childbirth after it. As for the second interpretation, the meat of a married woman’s haircut is better if the married woman sees that she looks prettier, brighter and more beautiful, as the vision shows more love in life and more happiness and success. Sometimes cutting hair in a dream symbolizes a divorce A married woman, especially if she sees that her husband is doing this. The meaning of the interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a pregnant woman. Cutting hair in a dream means going through the pain of pregnancy, and cutting beautiful hair indicates the birth of a girl, and short hair indicates a male. As for a pregnant woman who sees her husband cutting her hair in her dream, this is a good sign that indicates the end of all disputes between them and that good luck awaits them in the future. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for men. Cutting hair in a man’s dream is better if the man sees a barber cutting his hair or sees in his dream that he enters To a barber shop. As for the man who sees in his dream that he is cutting his hair, this is a sign of his involvement in a dangerous matter that could push the dreamer to do bad things with undesirable consequences. The meaning of love and friendship between them. For a man who dreams of a stranger cutting his hair or cutting his hair, this is a sign of loss of money, loss of livelihood, and entry into a spiral of crises and sorrows. Cutting a man’s hair in a dream may indicate the death of a close or dear person, and it may indicate a non-chronic or serious illness, and it may also indicate An accidental or emergency financial crisis. The meaning of cutting long hair in a dream: This vision varies depending on the elements that make it up. The best way to cut long and beautiful hair. If a single woman or girl sees someone she does not know doing this, whether it is evidence of marriage or an illness
